comments.body: I never know if the New BSD is `BSD 2-Clause` or `BSD 3-Clause`. Do you mind updating that to the right version of the licence to make it easy to recognize?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@about:
  home: https://nilearn.github.io
  license: New BSD
  summary: Statistical learning for neuroimaging in Python
